titleStmt.title: The Booke in meeter of Robin Conscience against his father Couetou[sne]sse, his mother N[ewgise and h]is sister Proud Bea[utye] [very necessar]y to be read and marked of all people that will auoide the dangers thereof, which is unto condemnation.

notesStmt.note: Bracketed title information suggested by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place and name of publisher form colophon; date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
